author: scottbw
msg: Replaced calls to decryptAuthToken with calls to validateAuthToken. The difference is that the validate method also checks expiry times on tokens. The call decrpytAuthToken will be made private to avoid this problem in future. Also use new convenience constructor for a standard-lifespan token

author: scottbw
msg: Added a single-use flag to AuthToken, and some convenience constructors for different kinds of token.

author: scottbw
msg: Replaced calls to decryptAuthToken with calls to validateAuthToken. The difference is that the validate method also checks expiry times on tokens. The call decrpytAuthToken will be made private to avoid this problem in future.

author: scottbw
msg: added null guard for participant thumbnail URL when rendering

author: scottbw
msg: Removed unused dependencies from cargo configuration
